recipesJson.name: Static Blue
recipesJson.author: Gabe8986
recipesJson.description:
A blue raspberry lemonade with a light pixie dust twist that I vape everyday. It's clean with a tart bite that doesn't linger..It is higher %'s than I normally go but works great in this recipe without being overly sweet at .3-.4%; although you can take the sweetener in any direction if you so desire. It's great as a shake and vape but a couple days steep really brings out the complexity; I hope you enjoy it..I appreciate any feedback.

On 10/23/2020 I bumped LB Blue raspberry from 4.65 to 5.65 and tweaked a couple background notes which added a slightly deeper blu razz taste and helps the lemonade pop a bit more. As of 10/23 this is my favorite blue razz vape and is the only thing I've been vaping lately..
